Zergling/Oinker


Zergling checks the long range Scanners. He sees the mass of Maximals 
way off in the distance. "Ummm, Nemisis, A whole lot of Maxim... 
Nemisis are you there. Ummm Oinker cna you go to the Brig and see
what 
happen to Nemisis. He's not responding."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`

Oinker looks at Zardus, "Yessuh, Suh. ah's on mah way." Oinker walked 
off in the direction of the Brig. 
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~`
Zergling open his com to the Maximals off in the Distance, "Maximals, 
please go away, Or Iron Raptor and Tavatron are Dead." He then open a 
com to all the Alliance Members, "Alliance members please get ready 
for an attack"
